mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(post_title, post_content, post_thumnail, category_id, user_id, created_at) VALUES(#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{postThumnail}, #{categoryId}, #{userId},NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.* FROM category c JOIN post p ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.user_id =#{userId} AND p.post_title like CONCAT ('%','#{keyword}','%') OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 3 ROWS ONLY
SELECT c.category_id, c.category_title, p.post_id,p.user_id, p.category_id FROM category c INNER JOIN post p ON p.user_id = c.category_id
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET category_id = #{categoryId}, post_title = #{postTitle}, post_content = #{postContent}, post_thumnail= #{postThumnail} WHERE post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.totalCount,p.totalPage,p.currentPage, (case currentPage when 0 then 1 else 0 end) first, (case currentPage when totalPage-1 then 1 ELSE 0 end) last FROM ( select count(*) totalCount, ceil(COUNT(*)/5) totalPage, #{page} as currentPage, 0 as first, 0 as last FROM post WHERE user_id = #{userId} and post_title like '%${keyword}%' ) p
